Class Draw

  • java.lang.Object
    • application.Draw

  • public class Draw
extends java.lang.Object
    Classname: Draw. Description: This class implements draw functionality and methods to draw the board

    • Constructor Detail

      • Draw

        public Draw(javafx.scene.canvas.GraphicsContext graphicsContext,
            int boardWidth,
            int length)
        Constructor for Draw. Creats an object and draws on a canvas. Defines pixel and sets the size of each cell on the canvas
        Parameters:
        graphicsContext - - canvas graphicsContext
        boardWidth - - boardwidth to the array in the board class, is used to define pixel size.
        length - - boardlength to the array in the board class, is used to define pixel size.

    • Method Detail

      • updatePixelSize

        public double updatePixelSize(int boardWidth,
                              int length)
        Updates pixel value. This method checks either length or width has larger value, and takes the larger value to calculate size of pixel. In pixel formula it is necessary to cast value to integer for the right calculation. returns new value of pixel
        Parameters:
        boardWidth - - width of the board.
        length - - length of the board.
        Returns:
        pixel - size of the cell.

      • getPixel

        public double getPixel()
        Gets the pixel value
        Returns:
        pixel - size in pixel.

      • setPixel

        public void setPixel(double pixel)
        Sets the value of pixel
        Parameters:
        pixel - - a double we use to define pixels value.

      • setColor

        public void setColor(javafx.scene.paint.Color col)
        Sets the value of color
        Parameters:
        col - - a Color object which contains the current color of the active cell.

      • draw

        public void draw(Board board)
        Draws the board and colors living cells on canvas.
        Parameters:
        board - - the current board
